item.title: 24 hours of chaos as mental health grants are slashed then restored

item.title: UK Conservatives Fire Senior Lawmaker Over ‘Plot’ to Defect
item.description: The leader of Britain’s Conservatives, Kemi Badenoch, said she had ousted Robert Jenrick for “plotting in secret” to defect from and damage the party.

item.title: Nearly 5 Million Accounts Removed Under Australia’s New Social Media Ban
